text: Huawei P20, Huawei P20 Pro and Huawei P20 Lite are smartphones developed by Huawei. They were released on April 6, 2018. == Features == ===Huawei P20=== Huawei P20 has 5.8 inch IPS LCD screen, Kirin 970 chipset, 12MP wide back camera, 20MP wide back camera, 24MP wide selfie camera, 4GB and 6GB RAM, 3400mAh battery capacity and USB-C 3.1. ===Huawei P20 Pro=== Huawei P20 Pro has 6.1 OLED screen, 4000mAh battery capacity, 40MP wide back camera, 8MP telephoto camera, 20MP wide back camera, Kirin 970 chipset, 6GB and 8GB RAM, 24MP wide selfie camera, USB-C 3.1 and fingerprint sensor. Huawei P20 can see in the dark. ===Huawei P20 Lite=== Huawei P20 Lite has a 5.84 inch IPS LCD screen, 16MP back camera, 2MP depth back camera, 16MP wide selfie camera, 24MP wide selfie camera, Kirin 659, 3GB and 4GB RAM, 3000mAh battery capacity and 18W wired charger. == Software == They runs EMUI 8.1 with Android 8.1 for the first time. They can upgrades to other versions like EMUI 9, EMUI 10, EMUI 11 and EMUI 12 when they came out. They can upgrades to other versions like HarmonyOS 2 and HarmonyOS 3 when came out in China only. == Reviews == Wired review the Huawei P20 Pro, good reviews like very nice lowlight camera, very good battery life and camera with three lens that can do in many different things, bad reviews like no headphone jack and no wireless charger. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Huawei mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2018 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras
